summary_teim: Sam Cooke, Jimmie Rodgers, Jimmy Yancey and Robert Johnson are inducted at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame's inaugural induction ceremony. Paul Shaffer and band perform.
summary_ssm: Sam Cooke, Jimmie Rodgers, Jimmy Yancey and Robert Johnson are inducted at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame's inaugural induction ceremony. Paul Shaffer and band perform.
contents_teim: Herb Alpert inducts Sam Cooke -- Barbara Cooke and Reverend Charles Cooke accept the award on his behalf -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces early influences category -- Jann Wenner introduces Jerry Wexler -- Jerry Wexler inducts Jimmy Rodgers -- Estella "Mama" Rodgers accepts award on his behalf -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Jimmy Yancey -- Family of Jimmy Yancey accepts the award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Robert Palmer -- Robert Palmer inducts Robert Johnson

abstract_ssm:
This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Herb Alpert inducts Sam Cooke -- Sam Cooke's family accepts the award on his behalf -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces early influences category -- Jann Wenner introduces Jimmie Rodgers -- Jerry Wexler inducts Jimmie Rodgers -- Family of Jimmie Rodgers accepts the award on his behalf -- 
Ahmet Ertegun introduces Jimmy Yancey -- Family of Jimmy Yancey accepts the award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Robert Johnson -- Robert Palmer inducts Robert Johnson
name_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
